mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve by making sure all interactive elements are fully optimized for touchscreens, particularly for smaller mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider optimizing images and leveraging browser caching to speed up loading times.
seoOptimizationTip: Focus on improving metadata, including title tags and descriptions, and adding more relevant keywords to enhance visibility.
userExperienceTip: Ensure the mobile app links are more seamlessly integrated for a smoother transition between site and app.
tips: Consider adding a FAQ section to address common guest inquiries.
Increase website accessibility by including an option for text resizing and improving contrast for readability.
